DataElement.preferredName: Corticosteroid Discontinue Prior To Protocol Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to the discontinuation of corticosteroids prior to the administration of a medical product that is tested in a clinical trial as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Corticosteroid Discontinue Prior To Protocol Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation)._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).

Property.preferredName: Discontinue Prior To Protocol Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have corticosteroids been dis
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have corticosteroids been discontinued at least 3 weeks prior to starting KRT-232 (AMG 232) + KRd, except for a dose equivalent to dexamethasone of less than or equal to 4 mg/day?
